title:
Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds
descriptions: Introducing Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, the ultimate hearing protection for your shooting range experience. With dynamic high-definition speakers and a sound-activated compression reaction time of just 0.02 seconds, you'll enjoy crystal-clear sound and unbeatable protection. The independent volume controls and noise reduction rating of 23 dB ensure a customized and safe audio experience. Plus, with 2 omnidirectional microphones, audio input jack, and recessed volume control knobs, you have all the features you need for a seamless shooting range session. Comfortable, foldable, and lightweight, these earmuffs are a must-have for any shooting enthusiast. Get yours today and elevate your shooting range experience to a whole new level.

"Experience crystal-clear sound and ultimate comfort with Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs. Perfect for the shooting range, these high-definition speakers deliver dynamic sound with a sound-activated compression reaction of just 0.02 seconds. Enjoy independent volume controls and 23 dB noise reduction for a customized experience. With 2 omnidirectional microphones, audio input jack, and recessed volume control knobs, these earmuffs offer unmatched versatility. Plus, with 2 AAA batteries included, you can start using them right away. Lightweight at just 0.98 pounds and foldable for easy storage, these earmuffs are a must-have for any shooting enthusiast. Upgrade your hearing protection with Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs today!"

Introducing the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, the ultimate hearing protection for your shooting range experience. With high-definition speakers and a lightning-fast sound-activated compression reaction time of 0.02 seconds, you'll never miss a beat. The independent volume controls allow you to customize your audio experience, while the 23 dB noise reduction rating ensures a peaceful environment. With 2 omnidirectional microphones and an audio input jack, you'll have crystal-clear sound and the option to connect your favorite devices. The recessed volume control knobs make adjustments a breeze, and with 2 AAA batteries included, you can start using them right away. Plus, the comfortable metal wire frame headband and foldable design make them perfect for extended wear and easy storage. Upgrade your shooting range experience with the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs today!
